description: Worked on the INRIX Hackathon project that won 1st place in the school-wide competition. Developed a web service that compares commercial real estate listings based on their relative price and traffic data using INRIX's API. Collaborated with a team to implement web scraping, API integration, and full-stack development using Vue.js and Node.js.

Led research projects in machine learning and data science, including misinformation detection AI and bellwether classification models. Collaborated with faculty members and other students to conduct data analysis, develop machine learning models, and present findings to academic and industry audiences.

Collaborated with Dr. Lukoff and senior design team to create digital twin technology for university dorms using virtual reality. Implemented Matterport SDK with Javascript to develop 3D virtual tours. Presented project to Matterport Executive Board and established relationship between Matterport and SCU.
